lines.text: [after Eddie has his way with his hypnotized chambermaid Nora]
Now go. Wait, wait, put your clothes on before you leave.
[while Eddie has his way with his hypnotized chambermaid Nora]

This is what you've always wanted. Taught to be quiet, obedient. It's what you've always wanted. Serve your master, serve your lover. You will not hear me until I tell you to listen. You'll continue to make love to me... 'cause I'm the one you love. Oh, this is the way I wanted it. I can't cope with these other women. They always want something. They're always talking. Always wanting you to be somebody. Do things. Yes, they always want you to do things, talk to you. They always get on your back about this and that. I can't stand that. That's not for me.
